basic.name: Classic
basic.description: Studio session with neutral background, 1 outfit change, 3 edited photos.

medium.name: Essence
medium.description: 2 backgrounds, 2 outfit changes, guided posing, 6 edited photos.

premium.name: Fine Art
premium.description: Artistic lighting, advanced retouching, 3 styles, 10 final photos.

basic.name: Moments Mini
basic.description: Short session, up to 3 people, 4 edited photos

medium.name: Family Story
medium.description: Up to 5 people, candid and posed shots, 8 edited photos.

premium.name: Legacy Session
premium.description: Extended session, multiple backgrounds, 12 edited photos + 8x10 print.

basic.name: Brand Starter
basic.description: Headshots or 3 product shots, neutral background, basic editing.

medium.name: Business Focus
medium.description: Headshots + product or office photos, 10 edited photos.

premium.name: Corporate Vision
premium.description: Full branding session: team portraits, products, details, 20 edited photos + web-ready versions.
